artist: Author: Hannah Potassium; Publisher: Hannah Potassium
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Loose, folded leaves, photographic image of crumpled paper with text printed in color offset lithography on wove paper covers; 27 pp.
medium: Color and black-and-white offset lithography, letterpress; loose, folded leaves
title: Power Machine: a lengthy discourse on the nature of squatting
